lead_paragraph: Following an international incident, Steve Rogers, aka Cap, goes head to head with Tony Stark, aka Iron Man, in a battle over the Superhero Registration Act, which governs that those with superhuman abilities must reveal themselves as such to the United States government and pledge to enforce law in conjunction with government agencies.
